document.masterDocTitle: Annotated catalogue of the carabid beetles of the Republic of Macedonia (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
References.
Molops rufipes pseudoosmanilis :

Molops pseudoosmanilis :
Krpach et al. 2013
: 36
(Mavrovo National Park). Material studied. “Korab: Štirovica,
30.06 . 1989
, V. Krpač”, 1 s. ( MMNH ); Korab, Kepi Bard, mountain pasture, 0 5.09 .2004, 2 s., leg. S. Hristovski (cSH); “Mavrovo: Ajdarova Livada, 0 5.05 . 2010 , V. Krpač”, 1 s. ( MMNH ). Distribution. 0 3 .

Molops rufipes steindachneri
Apfelbeck, 1908
[= jablanicensis Mařan, 1940 ]

References.

Apfelbeck 1907 a
: 35 (Ljuboten)
;
Apfelbeck 1907 b
: 503 (Ljuboten);
Apfelbeck, 1908

Müller, 1930
: 123 (Šar Planina);
Müller 1918
: 8 (Ljuboten).

Mařan 1940 c
: 191 (Šar Planina, Korab)
.

Molops rufipes :
Hieke 1981

(Šar Planina: Popova Šapka; Bistra);
Krpach et al. 2013
: 36 (Mavrovo National Park).

Type material of
Molops rufipes steindachneri
: “Schar Dagh Ljuboten” / “Coll. Apfelbeck”,
1 ♂
lectotype and 15 paralectotypes ( HNHM ).
